languages.text: "Конечно", {n}— Абеляр закладывает руки за пояс.{/n} "Хорошая новость — воздушные генераторы исправны и работают как часы, хоть их, судя по последнему отчету, тоже пытались вывести из строя. Если бы проклятым фанатикам это удалось, мы бы сейчас здесь с вами не говорили!"

traits.locale_text: "Конечно", {n}— Абеляр закладывает руки за пояс.{/n} "Хорошая новость — генератор {g|Encyclopedia:GellarField}поля Геллера{/g} исправен и работает как часы. Если б и он отказал или хотя бы засбоил... наверное, мы бы сейчас здесь с вами не говорили!"

languages.text: "Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"
languages.original_text: "Конечно", {n}— Абеляр закладывает руки за пояс.{/n} "Хорошая новость — воздушные генераторы исправны и работают как часы, хоть их, судя по последнему отчету, тоже пытались вывести из строя. Если бы проклятым фанатикам это удалось, мы бы сейчас здесь с вами не говорили!"

traits.locale_text: "Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

"Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

"Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

"Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

languages.text: “当然有。”{n}阿贝拉德用手扶着腰，开了口。{/n}“根据最后一份报告，袭击者之前打算摧毁我们的空气发电机，但空气发电机已经修好了，目前正在顺利运作。如果那些该死的疯子真的摧毁了发电机，我们现在恐怕就没办法站在这里聊天了！”
languages.original_text: "Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

traits.locale_text: “当然有。”{n}阿贝拉德用手扶着腰，开了口。{/n}“根据最后一份报告，袭击者之前打算摧毁我们的空气发电机，但空气发电机已经修好了，目前正在顺利运作。如果那些该死的疯子真的摧毁了发电机，我们现在恐怕就没办法站在这里聊天了！”

languages.text: 「おおよそそのとおりです」{n}アベラードは腰に手を当てて話す。{/n}「航空ジェネレーターは修理され、順調に稼動しています。最後の報告によると、襲撃者たちはジェネレーターを破壊しようとしたとのことです。もしあの狂信者たちの試みが成功していたら、あなたも私も今ここに立って話していることはなかったでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

traits.locale_text: 「おおよそそのとおりです」{n}アベラードは腰に手を当てて話す。{/n}「航空ジェネレーターは修理され、順調に稼動しています。最後の報告によると、襲撃者たちはジェネレーターを破壊しようとしたとのことです。もしあの狂信者たちの試みが成功していたら、あなたも私も今ここに立って話していることはなかったでしょう！」

languages.text: "Durchaus", {n}sagt Abelard und legt die Hände auf die Hüften.{/n} "Die Luftgeneratoren sind repariert und laufen bestens, obwohl die Angreifer laut letztem Bericht versucht haben, sie zu zerstören. Hätten diese verdammten Fanatiker Erfolg gehabt, würden wir beide jetzt nicht hier stehen und uns unterhalten!"
languages.original_text: "Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

traits.locale_text: "Durchaus", {n}sagt Abelard und legt die Hände auf die Hüften.{/n} "Die Luftgeneratoren sind repariert und laufen bestens, obwohl die Angreifer laut letztem Bericht versucht haben, sie zu zerstören. Hätten diese verdammten Fanatiker Erfolg gehabt, würden wir beide jetzt nicht hier stehen und uns unterhalten!"

languages.text: « Mais très certainement, {n}dit Abélard en posant les mains sur ses hanches.{/n} Les générateurs d'air ont été réparés et fonctionnent correctement, cela bien que, d'après les derniers rapports, les assaillants aient tenté de les détruire. Si ces maudits fanatiques avaient réussi, nous ne serions pas ici en train de discuter ! »
languages.original_text: "Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais très certainement, {n}dit Abélard en posant les mains sur ses hanches.{/n} Les générateurs d'air ont été réparés et fonctionnent correctement, cela bien que, d'après les derniers rapports, les assaillants aient tenté de les détruire. Si ces maudits fanatiques avaient réussi, nous ne serions pas ici en train de discuter ! »

languages.text: «Ciertamente». {n}Abelard coloca sus manos sobre la cadera.{/n} «Los generadores de aire ya están reparados y operando con normalidad, aunque, de acuerdo con el último informe, parece que los atacantes trataron de destruirlos. ¡De haber tenido éxito esos execrables fanáticos, ahora no estaríamos hablando!».
languages.original_text: "Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

traits.locale_text: «Ciertamente». {n}Abelard coloca sus manos sobre la cadera.{/n} «Los generadores de aire ya están reparados y operando con normalidad, aunque, de acuerdo con el último informe, parece que los atacantes trataron de destruirlos. ¡De haber tenido éxito esos execrables fanáticos, ahora no estaríamos hablando!».

languages.text: "Var tabii." {n}Abelard, ellerini kalçalarına koymuş hâlde konuşuyor.{/n} "Son rapora göre saldırganlar hava jeneratörlerini imha etmeye kalkmış olsa da jeneratörler onarıldı ve sorunsuz çalışıyor. Baş belası fanatikler başarılı olsaydı şu an burada durup konuşuyor olamazdık!"
languages.original_text: "Most certainly," {n}Abelard says, setting his hands on his hips.{/n} "The air generators have been repaired and are running smoothly, although according to the last report, it seems the attackers tried to destroy them. If those damned fanatics had succeeded, you and I wouldn't be standing here speaking now!"

traits.locale_text: "Var tabii," {n}diyor Abelard ellerini kalçalarına koyarak.{/n} "Son rapora göre saldırganlar hava jeneratörlerini imha etmeye kalkmış olsa da jeneratörler onarıldı ve sorunsuz çalışıyor. Baş belası fanatikler başarılı olsaydı şu an burada durup konuşuyor olamazdık!"
